faqs.a:
UNLI 5G - UNLIMITED DATA

📶 Unlimited 5G Data (up to 500 Mbps)
📦 Free 5G WiFi 6 na Modem
💰 Promo: ₱745/month for the first 6 months (then ₱1,490/month).

✔ Earn DITO Rewards Points with each bill payment
✔ Bonus 30-day Prime Video Subscription

FIXED PLAN ONLY NO HIDDEN CHARGES
 ➡️ DITO UNLI 5G 1490 up to 500Mbps

👉🏻 KABIT MUNA BAGO BAYAD 
👉🏻 NO INSTALLATION FEE | ADVANCE PAYMENT ONLY 
👉ADVANCE PAYMENT - YUNG IBABAYAD MO AYUN DIN BAYAD MO PARA SA UNANG BUWAN (PWEDENG UMABOT UPTO TWO MONTHS) 

⚡ 1-2 days process (within NCR), 2-7 days (outside NCR)

Madali lang mag-apply!
1️⃣ I-check muna natin kung available ang DITO 5G sa area mo.
2️⃣ Kapag serviceable,I-secure ang requirements gaya ng valid ID at proof of residency.
3️⃣ Pagkatapos ay magsagot ng application form

Hi sir/ma'am! Pwede po ba humingi ng small favor? magpapa-like lang po ng page para updated ka na din po sa mga EXCLUSIVE bonus at tips about sa Unli 5G postpaid plan 😉 

Magpo-post din po ako sa page kung pano ka po makakalibre ng internet bill at pwede ka pa kumita ng extra income kapag nag-apply ka sa page ko 🔥💰✔

Click mo lang po yung link sa baba para I-LIKE po yung page:
https://www.facebook.com/conect.earn

Thank you in advanced!😉

Para 𝗺𝗮-𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸 kung available ang 𝗗𝗜𝗧𝗢 𝟱𝗚 service sa area mo, paki-provide ang iyong 𝐚𝐝𝐝𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬

PROVINCE:
MUNICIPAL/CITY:
BRGY:
YES, Dito 5g covered ang area niyo ma'am/sir. Kung wala na po kayo ibang tanong ay pwede na po tayo magcheck ng valid ID mo at mag-fill out ng form 😉
THANK YOU FOR YOUR INTEREST sa pag-check ng offer pero hindi pa Dito 5g ang inyong area.

Pakisigurado po Ma'am/Sir na maipasa ang kumpletong documentary requirements na 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐝, 𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐰, 𝐧𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐬𝐚, 𝐚𝐭 𝐧𝐚𝐤𝐚-𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐧 𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐭 para maayos naming ma-assess ang iyong application.

𝐑𝐄𝐐𝐔𝐈𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐒:

✅ 𝟏 𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐕𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐝 𝐈𝐃 𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐠 (𝘬𝘶𝘯𝘨 𝘱𝘢𝘳𝘦𝘩𝘰 𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘥𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴 𝘴𝘢 𝘐𝘋 𝘢𝘵 𝘪𝘯𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘥𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴)

Parehas po ba ang address mo sa ID at ang installation address mo?

kung:
➡ WALANG ADDRESS na nakalagay sa ID o;
➡ HINDI pareho ang address na nasa ID at kung san ka magpapa-install ng WiFi.

Kailanga magpasa ng Proof of Billing(𝑷𝑶𝑩):
𝘋𝘢𝘱𝘢𝘵 𝘯𝘢𝘬𝘢-𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘨𝘢𝘭𝘢𝘯 𝘴𝘢 𝘮𝘢𝘨 𝘢𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘭𝘺 𝘯𝘨 𝘸𝘪𝘧𝘪 𝘢𝘵 𝘯𝘢𝘬𝘢 𝘢𝘥𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴 𝘬𝘶𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘢𝘯 𝘪𝘬𝘢𝘬𝘢𝘣𝘪𝘵 𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘸𝘪𝘧𝘪

✅ Utility bills
✅ Others: Club membership SOA
✅ Address-bearing Proof of Identity
✅ Bank-issued documents

👉Kung walang proof of billing..pwede kayong kumuha ng 𝐁𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐜𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞, ilagay sa purpose, "𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗲𝘁 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻"
𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗘𝗥: 𝘸𝘢𝘨 𝘬𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘮𝘶𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘱𝘪𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘩𝘢𝘯

👉Pwede rin ang Shopee or Lazada parcel basta naka pangalan sa maga-apply at naka-address sa paglalagyan ng wifi. (𝘬𝘢𝘩𝘪𝘵 𝘴𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘩𝘰𝘵 𝘭𝘢𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘢 𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘴 𝘯𝘨 𝘥𝘦𝘭𝘪𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘵𝘦𝘮𝘴)☺️

✔️ Kailangan latest po yung i-present na parcel receipt not more than 2 months

✔️ For parcel  receipt kailangan naka-indicate at naka-declare ang parcel order completed, Complete name ng Applicant at same as installation address ng papakabitan.

✔️ Paki-screenshot yung pinaka Order completed/received na ang item. Nandon ang buong pangalan ng applicant, date at ang address na papakabitan na house/unit.

faqs.q: STEP #3.1 - FILL OUT FORM SUBS INFO
faqs.a:
(1 of 4) 𝐒𝐔𝐁𝐒𝐂𝐑𝐈𝐁𝐄𝐑 𝐈𝐍𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍:
𝘗𝘳𝘦𝘧𝘪𝘹: 
*𝘍𝘪𝘳𝘴𝘵 𝘕𝘢𝘮𝘦: 
𝘔𝘪𝘥𝘥𝘭𝘦 𝘕𝘢𝘮𝘦: 
*𝘓𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘕𝘢𝘮𝘦: 
𝘚𝘶𝘧𝘧𝘪𝘹: 
*𝘎𝘦𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳: 
*𝘋𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘉𝘪𝘳𝘵𝘩 (MM/DD/YYYY): 
*𝘊𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘻𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘩𝘪𝘱: Filipino
*𝘔𝘰𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳'𝘴 𝘔𝘢𝘪𝘥𝘦𝘯 𝘕𝘢𝘮𝘦:
*𝘏𝘰𝘮𝘦 𝘈𝘥𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴(COMPLETE):

faqs.q: STEP #3.2 - FILL OUT FORM CONTACT INFO
faqs.a:
(2 of 4) 𝐂𝐎𝐍𝐓𝐀𝐂𝐓 𝐈𝐍𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍:
*𝘗𝘳𝘪𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘔𝘰𝘣𝘪𝘭𝘦 𝘗𝘩𝘰𝘯𝘦: 
𝘈𝘭𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦 𝘔𝘰𝘣𝘪𝘭𝘦 𝘕𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳(optional): 
*𝘗𝘳𝘪𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘌𝘮𝘢𝘪𝘭: 
𝘈𝘭𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦 𝘌𝘮𝘢𝘪𝘭(optional):

faqs.q: STEP #3.3 - FILL OUT FORM EMPLOYMENT DETAILS
faqs.a:
(3 of 4) 𝐄𝐌𝐏𝐋𝐎𝐘𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓 𝐃𝐄𝐓𝐀𝐈𝐋𝐒:
*𝘌𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘦𝘳 / 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘺: 

*𝘌𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘦𝘳 / 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘺 𝘛𝘺𝘱𝘦: (Choose one: Probationary / Regular / Project-Based / Co-Terminus / Permanent / Others)

*𝘗𝘰𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘛𝘺𝘱𝘦: (Choose one: CEO/President / SVP/VP/AVP / Executive/Director / Manager/Asst Manager / Supervisor / Specialist|Staff / Project|Contractual Employee / Consultant / Others)

*𝘖𝘤𝘤𝘶𝘱𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘛𝘺𝘱𝘦: (Choose one: Employed - Government / Self-Employed|Personal Business / Unemployed / Retired / Student / Housewife / OFW / Others / Employed - Private)

*𝘑𝘰𝘣 𝘛𝘪𝘵𝘭𝘦: 
*𝘌𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘦𝘳 / 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘺 𝘊𝘰𝘯𝘵𝘢𝘤𝘵 𝘕𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳: 
*𝘌𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘦𝘳 / 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘺 𝘈𝘥𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴:

faqs.q: STEP #3.4A - FILL OUT FORM DOCUMENTS SAME ADDRESS SA ID & INSTALLATION
faqs.a:
(4 of 4) 𝐃𝐎𝐂𝐔𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐀𝐑𝐘 𝐑𝐄𝐐𝐔𝐈𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐒: 
*𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘧 𝘐𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 / 𝘗𝘳𝘪𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘐𝘋: (ex: National ID)
*𝘐𝘋 𝘯𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳:

 

𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐈𝐃𝐬 𝐋𝐢𝐬𝐭:
(Choose one: National ID / Integrated Bar of the Philippines ID / Alien Certificate of Registration (ACR) / Unified Multi-purpose ID / GSIS e-Card / Person with Disabilities card / Bureau of Internal Revenue ID / Social Security System ID / Digitized Voter’s ID / PRC ID / Driver’s License / Others / Postal ID (Digitized) / Tax Identification Number (TIN) - Digitized / Passport)

faqs.q: STEP #3.4B - FILL OUT FORM DOCUMENTS WALAMG ADDRESS SA ID O MAGKAIBA NG ADDRESS SA ID & INSTALLATION
faqs.a:
(4 of 4) 𝐃𝐎𝐂𝐔𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐀𝐑𝐘 𝐑𝐄𝐐𝐔𝐈𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐒: 
*𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘧 𝘐𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 / 𝘗𝘳𝘪𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘐𝘋: (ex: National ID)
*𝘐𝘋 𝘯𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳:

*𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘧 𝘉𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘨: (ex: Brgy clearance) 


𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐈𝐃𝐬 𝐋𝐢𝐬𝐭:
(Choose one: National ID / Integrated Bar of the Philippines ID / Alien Certificate of Registration (ACR) / Unified Multi-purpose ID / GSIS e-Card / Person with Disabilities card / Bureau of Internal Revenue ID / Social Security System ID / Digitized Voter’s ID / PRC ID / Driver’s License / Others / Postal ID (Digitized) / Tax Identification Number (TIN) - Digitized / Passport)

𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐟 𝐨𝐟 𝐁𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬:
(Choose one: Utility bills / Others: Club membership SOA / Address-bearing Proof of Identity / Bank-issued documents / Brgy clearance / Parcel receipt)

faqs.q: STEP #3.4C - FILL OUT FORM SECONDARY IDs ANG AVAILABLE
faqs.a:
(4 of 4) 𝐃𝐎𝐂𝐔𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐀𝐑𝐘 𝐑𝐄𝐐𝐔𝐈𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐒: 

𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘧 𝘐𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 / 𝘚𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘐𝘋 1: (ex: Company ID)
*𝘐𝘋 𝘯𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳:
𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘧 𝘐𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 / 𝘚𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘐𝘋 2: (ex: GOCC ID)
*𝘐𝘋 𝘯𝘶𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳:

*𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘧 𝘉𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘨: (ex: Brgy clearance) 

 

𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐈𝐃𝐬 𝐋𝐢𝐬𝐭:
(Choose one: Company ID / GOCC ID / Postal ID (Paper-based card) / Seaman’s Book/ OFW ID / 
Exclusive Club Membership ID w/pic and copy of SOA / Police Clearance / Firearm license ID / Tax Identification Number Card / School ID (18 & above) - Academic / NCDA ID - PWD IDs / Senior Citizen Card / Business Registration Number)

𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐟 𝐨𝐟 𝐁𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬:
(Choose one: Utility bills / Others: Club membership SOA / Address-bearing Proof of Identity / Bank-issued documents / Brgy clearance / Parcel receipt)
For verification process, makakareceive ka ng verification codes via text at email galing kay Dito. Paki-forward po sakin para sa submission ng application mo ma'am/sir.
𝗣𝗮𝗸𝗶𝘀𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗻𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗴 𝗽𝗼 𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗼 𝘆𝘂𝗻𝗴 𝗻𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗶𝘃 𝗺𝗼 𝗻𝗮 𝗥𝗲𝗳𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗻𝘂𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝘀𝗮 𝘁𝗲𝘅𝘁 𝗼 𝘀𝗮 𝗲𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗹.. 𝗻𝗮𝗴-𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗽𝗼 𝘀𝗮 𝟴𝟮𝟱𝟬.......

𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐈𝐍𝐃𝐄𝐑𝐒:
📌 Makakatanggap ka po ng call at message about the installation, mga updates sa schedule at approval within 24-48 hours po.

📌 Siguraduhin pong active at reachable ang contact number para sa mas maayos na coordination.

📌 Ang mga lugar po na mahina ang signal ay maaaring magdulot ng delay o cancellation ng installation.

📌 Libre ang setup, at hindi mo na kailangan ng additional wiring or wall attachments. 

📌 Ang installation ay within 24–48 hours (within NCR) pagkatapos ma-approve ang application. 2-7 days (outside NCR)

📌 Sa mismong araw ng installation, magkakaroon ng actual na signal testing para matiyak ang bilis ng connection. 

📌 Kung ang signal strength ay mas mababa sa 100 Mbps, hindi itutuloy ang installation, at wala kang kailangang bayaran.
